SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Name: USR_USP_CHILD_REGISTER
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_CHILD_REGISTER ( @childID uniqueidentifier, -- Specify a Sponsorship Opportunity ID (same as the child's ID) if the sproc should only process a single child @changeAgentID uniqueidentifier) -- Used to specify change agent for CHANGEDBYID and ADDEDBYID fields
as begin
declare @childIDList dbo.USR_UDT_CHILDIDLIST
begin try if @childID is null RAISERROR 1000000 '@childID cannot be null'
insert @childIDList select @childID
exec dbo.USR_USP_CHILDREN_REGISTER @childIDList, @changeAgentID
end try begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1 end catch
return 0
end
